name: http-log
hubDesc: Send request and response logs to an HTTP server
description: Send request and response logs to an HTTP server.

fields.name: http_endpoint
fields.help: The HTTP endpoint (including the protocol to use) to which the data will be sent.

fields.name: method
fields.help: An optional method used to send data to the http server, other supported values are PUT, PATCH

fields.name: timeout
fields.help: An optional timeout in milliseconds when sending data to the upstream server

fields.name: keepalive
fields.help: An optional value in milliseconds that defines for how long an idle connection will live before being closed
